text: Nkrumah is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Kwame Nkrumah (1909–1972), the first Prime Minister and then first President of Ghana. * Fathia Nkrumah (1932–2007), wife of Kwame Nkrumah and First Lady of Ghana. * Gamal Nkrumah (born 1959), Ghanaian journalist. * Samia Nkrumah (born 1960), Ghanaian journalist and politician. * Sekou Nkrumah (born 1963), Ghanaian politician. * Kwame Nkrumah-Acheampong (born 1979), Ghanaian skier. == See also == * Nkrumah University, a university in Zambia. * Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology, a university in Kumasi, Ghana. * Kwame Nkrumah Ideological Institute, a former educational institute in Winneba, Ghana. * Kwame Nkrumah Mausoleum, a memorial in Accra, Ghana, dedicated to Kwame Nkrumah. * FPSO Kwame Nkrumah, an oil storage and offloading vessel named after Kwame Nkrumah. Category:Surnames of Akan origin
title: Nkrumah
